塠字的基本解释

塠
duī
古同“堆”。

塠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duī］
［《廣韻》都回切，平灰，端。］
亦作“垖1”。亦作“塠1”。亦作“1”。
(1)丘阜。多用于地名。
(2)堆积。
(3)引申谓充满。
(4)指堆积之物。
(5)比喻众多，聚积。
(6)量词。
[②]［zuī］
亦作“垖2”。
犹堆（duī），用于“归里包堆”。归里包堆，方言，意为总计。

塠字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塠； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页236第14
【集韻】都回切，音堆。落也。　又倉回切，音崔。讁也。　亦作䜃。或曰同堆。

塠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
塠字的起名意思

暂无。

Highland
Basic explanation of words
Highland
duī
Gu Tong "heap".
Highland
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duī］
["Guangyun" are all cut back, flat gray, end. ]
Also known as "垖1". Also known as "塠1". Also known as "1".
(1) Qiu Fu. Mostly used for place names.
(2) Accumulation.
(3) By extension, it is full.
(4) Refers to accumulated objects.
(5) There are many metaphors and accumulation.
(6) Quantifiers.
[②]［zuī］
Also known as "垖2".
Dui (duī) is used for "guilibaodui". Guili Baodui, in dialect, means total.
Highland
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Earth Character Department] 　塠; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 236 14
[Jiyun] All cut back, sound pile. Fall also.　Chang back and cut back, Yin Cui. Humiliation.　 also for 䜃. Or the same pile.
